item.title: WONTFIX Say Forget It at Work in a Nicer Way - Black Design
item.description: Refusing a work request is not an easy thing to do. The term WONTFIX is a common way to do so in the software development business. It is arguably more polite than saying “forget it”, but the person who made the request may still be offended. /...

item.title: Python Data Science Handbook: Essential Tools for Working with Data
item.description: A review of the Python Data Science Handbook, which covers IPython, NumPy, pandas, Matplotlib and machine learning with Scikit-Learn, and was written by Jake VanderPlas.
